scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix shell-app" "npm run dev --prefix test-app"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix shell-app && npm run build --prefix test-app
scripts.serve: concurrently "npm run serve --prefix shell-app" "npm run serve --prefix test-app"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix shell-app && npm install --prefix test-app
